title: 10/30/2020 HOUR 2 - Michael Wilbon
itunes:title: 10/30/2020 HOUR 2 - Michael Wilbon
description:
In the 2nd hour of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recalls Tony La Russa being of baseball's early manager that went by analytics. Michael Wilbon joins the show to talk about the Tony La Russa hire to the Chicago White Sox. Questions about the NBA start time is beginning to bubble, and the Cleveland Browns wont be better without OBJ, but different.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
